example_sentence_italian: Mi ha dato un buongiorno cordiale.
example_sentence_english: He gave me a cordial good morning.

example_sentence_english: We exchange some good mornings every morning.

example_sentence_italian: Il tono del buongiorno era gentile.

example_sentence_english: I respond to the good morning with a smile.
